events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to request a refund because the item is not what I expected.
The customer has reported a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the received product.
Assigning a complaints agent to handle the refund request and assist the customer further.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want a refund and Iâ€™m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and explain why the product did not meet your expectations?
My order number is 123456. The item looks very different from the pictures and the quality is poor.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund for you once you return the product. I will send you the return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. That sounds good. Please send the return label so I can send the product back.
We have sent you the return label via email. Once we receive the product, the refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the return label and if you need any assistance with the return process.
Yes, I received the label and have already dropped off the package at the post office. Thank you for your help!
We have processed your refund today. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Your refund case is now closed. Please contact us if you have any further questions or concerns.
